text: __NOTOC__ PUK may refer to: ==Geographical== * PUK, or Busan–Gyeongnam Area, a metropolitan area in South Korea ==Political== * or National Unity Party, an Albanian political party * Patriotic Union of Kurdistan, a Kurdish political party ==Technological== * Pin Unlock Key or personal unblocking code (PUC), a code used in GSM mobile phones ==People== * Niels Kristian Iversen or PUK, Danish speedway-rider ==See also== * Puck (disambiguation)
title: PUK
